snippet: The bill passed the State Senate by a 12-to-9 vote and the governor quickly signed it, making Delaware the 11th state to permit same-sex marriages.
abstract: Delaware becomes 11th state to legalize same-sex marriage.

byline.contributor: Rita K. Farrell contributed reporting from Dover, Del.

lead_paragraph: The bill passed the State Senate by a 12-to-9 vote and the governor quickly signed it, making Delaware the 11th state to permit same-sex marriages.

headline.main: Delaware, Continuing a Trend, Becomes the 11th State to Allow Same-Sex Unions
headline.print_headline: Delaware, Continuing a Trend, Becomes the 11th State to Allow Same-Sex Unions

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
